results.definition: trade name of a company that produces musical recordings
examples: the artists and repertoire department of a recording label is responsible for finding new talent
They labeled him unfit to work here

results.definition: attach a tag or label to
a brief description given for purposes of identification
examples: the label modern is applied to many different kinds of architecture

results.definition: an identifying or descriptive marker that is attached to an object
a radioactive isotope that is used in a compound in order to trace the mechanism of a chemical reaction
assign a label to; designate with a label
distinguish (an element or atom) by using a radioactive isotope or an isotope of unusual mass for tracing through chemical reactions
distinguish (as a compound or molecule) by introducing a labeled atom
